title: London, BL, Add. 14440

book of Judges according to the Peshitta version
two books of Samuel (undivided) according to the Peshitta version

Proverbs of Solomon, according to the Peshitta version
Proverbs of Jesus the son of Sirach, or Ecclesiasticus, according to the Peshitta version
book of Ecclesiastes or Koheleth, according to the Peshitta version
book of Ruth, according to the Peshitta version
Song of Songs, according to the Peshitta version
book of Job according to the Peshitta version
